The video was shared on social media wit: implying that it showed recent footage of Friday namaz at Delhi's Jama Masjid despite the lockdown.
The video was actually over a month old: first aired on March 13, and News24 claimed that it was shared by mistake.
News24 had previously uploaded the same: suggesting that the repeated sharing was not an inadvertent error.
The context surrounding the video: s initial upload and subsequent resharing indicates a deliberate attempt to mislead the audience, as the coronavirus situation and government regulations had significantly changed by the time of the last upload on April 17.
